items.sentence: There were many injured people, but hardly any people were missing.
Tom got on the elevator and pressed the button for the third floor.
Tom has been working for the same website design company for years.
Tom got worried when he learned about the medicine\'s side effects.
Tom had been Mary\'s best friend for as long as she could remember.
Mary can\'t stand Tom\'s boss, because he\'s a male chauvinist pig.
I\'m on a budget, so I don\'t eat out more than three times a week.
People have eaten with their fingers from the beginning of history.
She told me once and for all that she did not want to see me again.
She was unable to completely give up her dream of traveling abroad.
